title: Count Vowels
statement:
# Count Vowels

Write a program to count the number of vowels in a string.

## Problem Description

Given a string, count how many vowels (a, e, i, o, u) it contains. The count should be case-insensitive.

## Input Format

A single line containing a string.

## Output Format

A single integer representing the count of vowels.

## Constraints

- 1 ≤ length ≤ 10^5
